definition: a strong band of tissue in the body that joins a muscle to a bone
a source of strength or power
to try as hard as you can to do something
a warning that particular things need to be considered before something can be done
a very small insect that is harmful to plants. There are several types of aphid, including, for example, greenfly.
the first part of the small intestine, next to the stomach
relating to the first part of the small intestine, next to the stomach
the third part of the small intestine

the special clothes that are worn or objects that are carried at official ceremonies
to force somebody out of a job or position of power, especially in order to take their place
extremely (in a way that other people feel jealous of)
in a way that makes people feel shocked, upset or angry
unlikely to happen and therefore not worth considering
a matter about which there may be difference of opinion or a lack of understanding
